title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Matty Ice Market, Bieniemy HC Snubs, Von/OBJ Rams Future. Bucs Brady Replacement
itunes:title: 3 and Out - Middlekauff's Weekend Mailbag: Matty Ice Market, Bieniemy HC Snubs, Von/OBJ Rams Future. Bucs Brady Replacement
description:
John answers listener questions in his weekend Mailbag, including if Matty Ice could part ways with the Falcons, why Eric Bieniemy can't land a head coaching job, if the Rams should bring back Von Miller and an inured OBJ, why John ranks Doggystyle as the best rap album ever, what the Bucs can do to replace Brady in 2022, and how he ranks positions in the draft after QB.

Subscribe NOW and follow Middlekauff and The Volume on Twitter, Instagram and YouTube for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
